SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AppContextListener
A servlet context listener that initializes and stops the session scheduler when the web application context is created and destroyed.
BeanCategory
Represents a category with an ID and a name.
BeanContactDetails
Represents the contact details of a person.
BeanSession
Represents a user session in the application.
BeanUserDetails
Represents user details in the application.
DaoRegisterLogin
Data Access Object (DAO) for user registration and login operations.
DaoSession
Data Access Object (DAO) for managing user sessions in the database.
DaoUserContact
Data Access Object (DAO) for managing user contact details.
FilterSession
A servlet filter that checks for a valid user session before allowing access to protected resources.
ServletChangePassword
Servlet that handles the password change functionality for users.
ServletCreateCategory
Servlet that handles the creation of new categories for a user.
ServletCreateContact
Servlet that handles the creation of a new contact for a user.
ServletEditContact
Servlet that handles the editing of an existing contact's details.
ServletEditUser
Servlet that handles editing user details, including adding, deleting, and updating contact information.
ServletLogout
Servlet that handles user logout by invalidating the user's session and clearing the session cookie.
ServletUserLogin
Servlet that handles user login functionality.
ServletUserRegister
Servlet that handles user registration functionality.
SessionScheduler
Manages the scheduling of session updates and automatic deletion of expired sessions in the application.
SessionTreeUpdate
Manages the updates and storage of session data in a tree set.
